content:
We need an Editor to take on these three important pages which have already been edited and improved, but have outstanding FIXME and some unresolved questions.

Manage Routes > Routes Tab
Manage Routes > Route Properties
Manage Routes > Use Routes
Use Routes is done, except for some minor screenshots to illustrate examples.
Stefano are you still getting this error, right now at 3:12PM 5/28 ?

I found the word "schema (" at the bottom of the Route page I changed it to "schematic (" and it now saves.
I left 'DONE SPIV' at the top of the page, can you remove it or shall I?
How do we mark the page as reviewed?
Stefano, You should be able to Edit Editor Manual - 2024 Status and Progress and add your review after the page.
